name: Generic Horror Game
description:
Generic Horror Game Search a house for keys

You're stuck in a house and need to find keys to open doors. Each door contains another key, plus a limb. 

Attach limbs to a dead body

The only way to escape the house is to find all the limbs and attach them to an old, dead body found in the basement to gain more time. There are 6 limbs to find (Left Leg, Left Foot, Left Hand, Right Leg, Right Foot, and Right Hand.) 

Don't run out of time

If you run out of time, then, well, you lose. It's okay though, because you can just try again.
